content: I'm thinking about setting up zulip-archive so we can keep a copy of our Zulip data. Here's the issue I just created: https://github.com/IQSS/chat.dataverse.org/issues/26

Well! That was pretty easy! I followed the steps at https://github.com/zulip/zulip-archive which involved

  • creating https://github.com/gdcc/zulip-archive
  • setting up a bot (type=general) called @zulip-archive
  • configuring which streams to archive (just web-public) with streams.yaml
  • setting up the GitHub Action
  • confirming that data is archived in the repo above as well as the HTML version at https://gdcc.github.io/zulip-archive/

Good enough!
